title: Summon Ice Beast
data: {{version031}} {{spell info}} '''Summon Ice Beast''' is a level 3 [[Ice Magic|Ice]]/[[Summonings|Summoning]] spell which summons an [[ice beast]] to attack your foes. [[Ice Elementalist]]s start with this spell in their spell library. ==Useful Info== A single [[ice beast]] is summoned. Higher [[spell power]] increases the ice beast's [[HD]], which increases HP, accuracy, and the strength of the freezing attack. Ice beast HD equals 3 + / 13, randomly rounded.{{source ref|0.28.0|spl-summoning.cc|208}} Duration of the summon is around 27 turns; it does not depend on spellpower. There is a summon cap of 1 ice beast; casting the spell again will cause the old summon to very quickly time out. ==Strategy== Ice Beasts are effective for the early- and mid- game, with decent stats overall. Their [[cold]] attacks work great in [[the Lair]]; since many Lair enemies are [[cold-blooded]], ice beasts have a chance to [[slow]] them. As bonuses, ice beasts are naturally [[poison resistance|rPois]], and do not trigger the bloodzerk of [[skyshark]]s. For Ice Magic users, it's an easily available summon, valuable because it is a summon (MP-efficient, takes hits, blocks line of fire). For Summonings users, it's another summon, allowing them to have more allies out at once. ==Monster Version== The monster version of the spell creates standard ice beasts without altered hit dice. The summon also has longer duration, around 81 turns. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== *Prior to [[0.31]], this spell was a level 4 Ice/Summoning spell. Also, the summon's [[duration class]] depended on power, ranging from 2 (around 18 turns) to 4 (around 36 turns). The formula was 2 + (1d - 1) / 4 (capped at 4). *In [[0.30]], Ice Elementalists start with this spell again. *Prior to [[0.28]], this spell had a summon cap of three. *Prior to [[0.27]], [[Ice Elementalist]]s and [[Summoner]]s started with this spell. *Prior to [[0.9]], this spell was level 5. ==References==
